import React,{ Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './weather.css'; class Weather extends Component { render(){ const {toLeft,toRight} =this.props let wea_Date=this.props.weather[0] ;console.log(wea_Date) return
search 地点

  • {wea_Date.city}

    {wea_Date.date}，{wea_Date.week}

    {wea_Date.tem}℃

    {wea_Date.tem1}℃/{wea_Date.tem2}℃ {wea_Date.wea}

    {toLeft();this.forceUpdate()}} >
    {toRight();this.forceUpdate()}}>

PM2.5

{wea_Date.air_level}

{wea_Date.air_pm25}

{wea_Date.win}

{wea_Date.win_meter}

{wea_Date.win_speed}

{wea_Date.air_tips}
} } export default Weather
